items.sentence: Everyone in my family can play a musical instrument.
Everyone stopped speaking when Tom entered the room.
Tom is obviously disappointed that Mary isn\'t here.
Tom is the only guy here who doesn\'t like baseball.
More men are going to die before this thing is over.
I wish I had bought stock in that company last year.
I wish there were a French translation of this book.
I wish there were more people like you in the world.
Laser surgery can fix some kinds of vision problems.
Tom signed his name with the pen Mary had given him.
